Title: Lupin the 3rd: Castle of Cagliostro
Writer: Monkey Punch (graphic novel series), Hayao Miyazaki (screenplay), Haruya Yamazaki (screenplay), Mary Claypool (ADR script), Maurice Leblanc (characters)
Actors: Yasuo Yamada, Eiko Masuyama, Kiyoshi Kobayashi, Makio Inoue
Plot: A dashing thief, his gang of desperadoes and an intrepid policeman struggle to free a princess from an evil count's clutches, and learn the hidden secret to a fabulous treasure that she holds part of a key to.
